topic.shortdesc: Building on comprehensive 0.1.9 foundation: Enterprise security compliance, audit trails, multi-tenant isolation, governance framework, and community governance model.

section.title: Foundation Complete
section.p: Version 0.2.0 builds on the complete 0.1.9 foundation including extended discovery, interoperability protocols (MCP, OpenAI, LangChain, CrewAI), semantic agent matching, and performance benchmarking standards with production-validated cross-platform integration.

section.title: Enterprise Security & Compliance
section.p: v0.2.0 introduces comprehensive enterprise-grade security and compliance features:

ul.li: Advanced Security Compliance Schemas: SOC 2 Type II, ISO 27001, NIST Cybersecurity Framework
Audit Trail Requirements: Immutable audit logs with cryptographic verification
Multi-Tenant Agent Isolation: Namespace isolation with resource quotas and network policies
Enterprise SSO Integration Standards: SAML 2.0, OAuth2/OIDC, Active Directory integration
Compliance Reporting Templates: Automated compliance report generation for major frameworks
Zero-Trust Architecture: Agent-to-agent authentication with certificate-based security
Data Classification Standards: PII/PHI handling with encryption at rest and in transit
Incident Response Framework: Automated threat detection and response workflows

section.title: Governance Framework
section.p: Comprehensive governance model for enterprise agent lifecycle management:

ul.li: Agent Lifecycle Governance: Formal approval workflows for agent deployment and updates
Version Compatibility Matrix: Automated compatibility testing and migration paths
Deprecation Policy Framework: Structured sunset process with impact analysis
Standard Change Proposal Process: RFC-based change management with community review
Community Governance Model: Technical steering committee and working groups
Policy Enforcement Engine: Automated policy validation and enforcement
Risk Assessment Framework: Agent risk scoring with mitigation strategies
Business Continuity Standards: Disaster recovery and failover specifications

section.title: Advanced Monorepo Structure
section.p: v0.2.0 completes the enterprise monorepo transformation with governance tooling:

ul.li: Governance Tooling: Policy validation, compliance checking, audit trail generation
Security Integration: Automated security scanning, vulnerability management
Enterprise Templates: Industry-specific agent templates (healthcare, finance, government)
Compliance Test Suites: Automated testing for regulatory requirements
Multi-Environment Support: Development, staging, production deployment pipelines
Advanced Monitoring: Business intelligence, predictive analytics, cost optimization
Documentation Platform: Interactive API docs, tutorials, certification programs

section.title: Key Deliverables
section.p: Enterprise-ready OSSA platform with comprehensive governance and compliance capabilities:

ul.li: Security Certification: SOC 2 Type II, ISO 27001 compliance validation
Governance Platform: Web-based governance dashboard with workflow management
Compliance Automation: Automated compliance reporting and audit preparation
Enterprise SDK: Multi-language SDKs with enterprise security features
Professional Services: Implementation guidance, training, and certification
Community Marketplace: Certified agent marketplace with enterprise support tiers
Reference Architecture: Enterprise deployment patterns and best practices
Migration Tools: Automated migration from proprietary platforms to OSSA

section.title: Implementation Strategy
section.p: Phased enterprise rollout with comprehensive testing and validation:

ul.li: Phase 1: Security framework implementation and compliance validation
Phase 2: Governance platform development and community structure
Phase 3: Enterprise integration testing and certification
Phase 4: Production deployment with professional services launch

section.title: Success Metrics
section.p: Enterprise adoption and governance effectiveness measurements:

ul.li: Security Compliance: 100% compliance with major frameworks (SOC 2, ISO 27001)
Governance Adoption: 95%+ enterprise customers using governance features
Community Growth: 10,000+ community members with active contribution
Enterprise Deployment: 100+ enterprise customers in production
Certification Program: 1,000+ certified OSSA professionals
Marketplace Activity: 5,000+ certified agents with enterprise support
